nodes.text: The All Worlds Ultimate Swoop Rally was a swoop racing event organized around 3626 BBY. It occurred on several planets, including Dantooine, Tatooine and Onderon. Held after the Dantooine Incursion, the Swoop Rally was hosted by B4-N9, an intense droid announcer built by swoop enthusiasts. Audience members consisted of members of various species, some of whom set up camp sites around the rally. On Dantooine, campers' had charred kath hound shanks for sustenance.
